java112.analyzer

Class AnalyzeFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java112.analyzer.AnalyzeFile

  • public class AnalyzeFile
extends java.lang.Object
    The AnalyzeFile class will handle the majority of the file processing. The AnalyzeFile class verify that an input file has been provided, then it will parse the content tokens. Once the file has been parsed into tokens the AnalyzeFile class will write all output files.
    Author:
    Tony Alvarz

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnalyzeFile

        public AnalyzeFile()
        Empty Constructor for AnalyzeFile

    • Method Detail

      • createAnalyzers

        private void createAnalyzers()
        Instantiates all analyzers and creates an array list to manage them.

      • runAnalysis

        public void runAnalysis(java.lang.String[] arguments)
        Confirms that the correct number of arguments have been passed in and initiates the file processing. This includes creating tokens, calling the fileChecker method and finally writing all ouput files
        Parameters:
        arguments - the command line arguments

      • fileChecker

        private void fileChecker()
        Checks to make sure we can read the passed in File for processing with exception handling. If we are able to read the file we then initiate parsing the file into tokens.

      • generateTokens

        private void generateTokens(java.io.BufferedReader input)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Parses the file content into single line strings. Those single line strings are then passed into the tokenIterator method to be broken into tokens.
        Parameters:
        input - the BufferedReader object that contains the file content
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • tokenIterator

        private void tokenIterator(java.lang.String inputLine)
        Parses the passed in line of strings into individual tokens. Each token is broken out based on non-word characters. Each token is then passed to be processed for reporting.
        Parameters:
        inputLine - a line of strings

      • analyzerLoop

        private void analyzerLoop(java.lang.String token)
        Loops through the list of analyzeers and invokes the processToken method for each.
        Parameters:
        token - a single token being passed in for processing

      • writeAllOutputFiles

        private void writeAllOutputFiles()
        Initiates the file output creation for all files by looping through each analyzer.

      • loadProperties

        public void loadProperties(java.lang.String propertiesFilePath)
        Loads the properties file into the properties instance variable. Exception handling is managed here for the properties file.
        Parameters:
        propertiesFilePath - the file path for the properties file we are to open and pull data from.
